ingredients.ingredient: 1 (20 ounce) can DOLEÂ® Crushed Pineapple, undrained
1 (10 ounce) package round angel food cake, cut into 3 layers

cookingTips: Use the pineapple juice undrained in the pudding mix for extra flavor and moisture
Layer the cake while it's still slightly warm so it absorbs the pudding mixture better
Chill the dessert for at least 2 hours before serving so layers set properly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I assemble this layered dessert without the cake becoming mushy? What's the best way to prepare it ahead?
